Docs.summary: XPathFunctionResolver provides access to the set of user defined XPathFunctions.

Docs.param: The number of arguments that the returned function must accept.
Docs.summary: Find a function in the set of available functions.
Docs.returns: The function or null if no function named functionName with arity arguments exists.
